name: Apple
description: A crisp, juicy fruit that is often red in color. Apples are great for snacking and baking.

name: Banana
description: A soft, sweet fruit that is yellow when ripe. Bananas are a convenient and healthy snack.

name: Orange
description: A juicy citrus fruit that is known for its vibrant color and refreshing taste.

name: Strawberry
description: A small, red fruit with a sweet taste and a distinctive aroma. Strawberries are perfect for desserts.

name: Lemon
description: A tangy citrus fruit that is yellow in color. Lemons are widely used for their juice and zest.

name: Grapes
description: Small, juicy fruits that come in clusters. Grapes can be eaten fresh or used to make wine.

name: Watermelon
description: A large, refreshing fruit with a thick green rind and sweet, juicy red flesh.

name: Pineapple
description: A tropical fruit with a tough, spiky exterior and sweet, tangy yellow flesh inside.

name: Mango
description: A juicy tropical fruit with a sweet and fragrant orange flesh. Mangoes are loved for their rich flavor.

name: Blueberry
description: Small, blue-purple berries that are sweet and slightly tart. Blueberries are packed with antioxidants.
